subject: Re: hi Kirk...
body:
Hi there:  The error I'm getting is after using the get command to get 
boot.img for example:
200:  command successful then 5500 failed to open file.
I have the latest Etch cd, but even with sbm I am not able to get my cd 
drive to boot... if I could get help with the command for sbm since it 
doesn't come up talking, I'd prefer that...
Anyway, thanks much...
Cheereo!
